tokenvisibility.settings.range-algorithm: Number of points to use when testing whether a token is within range of another. Also controls number of points for line-of-sight points algorithm. See https://github.com/caewok/fvtt-token-visibility#settings for a full explanation.
tokenvisibility.settings.range-points-fi: Token inset corners and center (5 points)
tokenvisibility.settings.range-points-3d: Test Bottom and Top Token Points
When applicable, use both the token elevation and the token line-of-sight to construct additional points for testing range and the line-of-sight points algorithm. (Requires Wall Height module.)
tokenvisibility.settings.range-distance-: Whether to measure token visibility range calculations in 3 dimensions, versus 2 (overhead view).
tokenvisibility.settings.los-algorithm.H: How to test a token's line-of-sight to another. Points will use the points from Range Algorithm. Area is generally more performance-intensive, but not always. See https://github.com/caewok/fvtt-token-visibility#settings for a full explanation.
tokenvisibility.settings.los-percent-are: Percentage of the token hit area that must be viewable to another token to be considered visible by that other token. If set to 0, then if any part of the token is viewable, it is considered visible.
tokenvisibility.DrawingConfiguration.isH: For area algorithms, treat the space indicated by the drawing (including elevation) as a hole for tiles. Only applicable when Levels is active.
